description:
Turn up the amps, step into the spotlight and rule the stage on your phone. Make the most of it by playing up to 20 of the hottest, breathtaking pieces from cult rock bands and get the crowd racing on lead guitar, bass guitar and drums. With pieces by Blink 182, No Doubt, Nirvana, Vampire Weekend, Sublime, Bush, David Bowie and other popular bands. This is the biggest, most complete rock 'n' roll game on the phone - from the # 1 video game franchise. Let the rock star in you out! 

• Play guitar, drums and bass for all songs!  
• A total of up to 20 new songs from the beginning (the number of songs may vary depending on the handset)
• Play as your favorite character in different locations around the world, e. B. in San Francisco, Cairo and the subway in New York City. (The number of locations may vary depending on the handset) 
• Additional downloadable MP3 function for better quality of the music pieces (availability of the function depends on the handset and mobile network operator) 
• Unlock 4 additional guitars and drums, earn successes and break records! 
• Test your skills with the two game modes and three difficulty settings that ensure endless fun.
• Animated rockers, spectators and location effects make you feel like a real rock star.
versionNote: Revisionist History Note - This PDK game has been patched to work on Pre3 and TouchPad, however most songs require a download that no longer works.
